rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Vastu-compliant orientation for positive energy flow. Includes built-in storage and a central courtyard view.

Luxurious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, open space to the courtyard for natural light and ventilation, featuring Mediterranean design elements such as stone cladding and decorative columns.
Open dining area integrated with kitchenette. Adheres to Vastu principles by maintaining a harmonious layout with adjacent living spaces.
Modern, open-plan kitchen with efficient work triangle and Mediterranean touches, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample light.
Central courtyard providing natural ventilation and a serene outdoor space. Designed following Vastu guidelines to promote positive energy flow.

openings.description: Primary entrance with wide, inviting doorway leading into the living area and courtyard, designed for easy access and alignment with Vastu principles.
Large floor-to-ceiling window in the living room providing panoramic views and abundant natural light.
Window overlooking the central courtyard, ensuring ventilation and connection with outdoor space.
